attributes.action: OPEN THE PUBS! SAVE OUR PUBS!
attributes.additional_details:
All pubs have track and trace/signing it books for those without mobiles/sanitising stations/temperature checks/ social distancing/capacity rules...
Allow pubs to open regardless of their tier!
Allow pubs to open without serving meals!
Allow the owners of pubs to excersize their right to earn a living and provide for their families! 
Give the pubs a chance ... STATISTICS show that pubs were not the issue before!!! Let them reopen!!! Covid has already caused closure of multiple pubs across the UK! Save the ones that are left!
attributes.background: Allow pubs to open regardless of what tier they are in! If the beauty industry can touch peoples hair and faces then bar staff should be allowed to bring a customer their drink! Pubs should be allowed to open with table service WITHOUT serving meals!  OPEN THE PUBS! SAVE OUR PUBS!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Save our hospitality industry. Allow all pubs to open on Tier one rules: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561716

Do not require pubs and bars in Tier 2 to only serve alcohol with a meal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561619
